lines.text: There's always a bigger agent, there's always a better part, and there's always a prettier girl.
I'll tell you what my problem is! A dream is waiting to come true, and I can't find a bed to put it on!
Time's winged chariot is breathing up my ass, baby.
I wouldn't dream of it, Sperm.
That's right, Sperm. You tell 'em, Sperm.
